title: What reasons are there for owning a 3D printer? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have to ask, probably none. If you need (or want) to make one-off generally small items out of plastic (perhaps pieces for a chess game that you designed to be futuristic looking) then an AM (additive Manufacturing, the official name for 3D printing) system might suit you. If what you want to make requires the strength of metal, though, then you likely don’t want to spend the money on a laser sintering AM machine - better to go to a place that will print as a service.

The family is suffering from cabin fever for a couple of weeks now… my supplies from eBay are still coming through, so I have almost all the components that I need, but fasteners, enclosures and standoffs are running low… So far the DLP 3D printer is providing us with an almost endless supply of widgets to keep us entertained. Lord help us if we run out of resin.
